items: Development of reports, dashboards, and data models using IBM Cognos
Creation and optimization of Framework Manager packages
Participation in BI governance and data architecture
Support, training, and mentoring of junior profiles
IBM Cognos (Report Studio, Dashboarding, Framework Manager, Data Sets, Data Modules)
5+ years of experience in BI, including at least 3 years with Cognos
An IBM Cognos certification is a plus
Knowledge of Power BI / Tableau is appreciated
